content: this sleeveless crop top is perfect for summer with two front panels that wrap around the body and tie at the back it is a cute and flirty option to wear with your favourite shorts this pattern is a size small and fits a b-cup bust with bra underneath i used a weight 4 cotton blend yarn loops & threads creme cotton in mustard and a 4 5mm crochet hook one skein of this yarn 432 yards was more than enough
